mapper.select: select status from sys_task_tb where task_no = #{task_no}

select * from sys_task_tb where (concat(',', receive_user, ',') like concat('%,', #{user_no}, ',%') or concat(',', receive_role, ',') like concat('%,', #{role_no}, ',%')) and concat(',', deal_user, ',') not like concat('%,', #{user_no}, ',%') and (status = '0' or status = '' or status is null)

select * from sys_task_tb where (concat(',', receive_user, ',') like concat('%,', #{user_no}, ',%') or concat(',', receive_role, ',') like concat('%,', #{role_no}, ',%')) and (concat(',', deal_user, ',') like concat('%,', #{user_no}, ',%') or status = '1')
